original_text: They went to tell everyone who lived in places near there. They brought sick people to Jesus. They carried those people to him on mats. Whenever they knew where Jesus was, they brought sick people to him there.
korean_text: 그 온 지방으로 달려 돌아 다니며 예수께서 어디 계시다는 말을 듣는 대로 병든 자를 침상째로 메고 나아오니

sentences.original_text: who lived in places near there
They brought sick people to Jesus
They carried those people to him on mats
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 사람들을 돗자리에 눕혀 그분께 운반했습니다

sentences.original_text: Whenever they knew where Jesus was
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 예수님께서 어디 계신지 알 때마다

sentences.original_text: they brought sick people to him there
